datasynth¶

Module for generating synthetic interaction histories @author Siddharth Reddy <sgr45@cornell.edu> 01/07/15

datasynth.sample_synthetic_model_and_history(sample_students, sample_assessments, sample_lessons, sample_prereqs, sample_interactions, embedding_kwargs)¶

Sample a synthetic skill embedding and interaction history

It is up to you to make sure that sample_assessments and sample_prereqs adhere to the bounds given in models.EmbeddingModel.anti_singularity_lower_bounds

Parameters:
  • sample_students (function) – A function that outputs a student tensor
  • sample_assessments (function) – A function that outputs a assessment matrix
  • sample_lessons (function) – A function that outputs a lesson matrix
  • sample_prereqs (function) – A function that outputs a lesson prereq matrix
  • sample_interactions (function) – A function that takes a models.EmbeddingModel as input and outputs a pd.DataFrame
  • object] embedding_kwargs (dict[str,) – Parameters to pass to models.EmbeddingModel constructor
Return type:

EmbeddingModel
Returns:

A skill model with a synthetic interaction history
